mapper.sql: ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, GOODS_TEXTURE, GOODS_TYPE, WASH_METHOD, GOODS_STATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_ID, GOODS_NAME, GOODS_PRICE, GOODS_NUM, TOTAL_PRICE, GOODS_TEXTURE, GOODS_TYPE, WASH_METHOD, GOODS_STATE, CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{goodsTexture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{washMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{goodsState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update order_detail
ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
GOODS_TEXTURE = #{goodsTexture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WASH_METHOD = #{washMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GOODS_STATE = #{goodsState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update order_detail set ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_ID = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_PRICE = #{goodsPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, GOODS_NUM = #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, GOODS_TEXTURE = #{goodsTexture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_TYPE = #{goodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WASH_METHOD = #{washMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GOODS_STATE = #{goodsState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select t1.CLASSIFY_NAME as classifyName from order_detail t left join ITEM_CLASSIFY t1 on t.GOODS_TYPE = t1.CLASSIFY_ID where t.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by GOODS_NUM desc limit 1
